item.title: One-shot CSS Injection - newdiary - 0ctf 2023
item.description:
<![CDATA[
This year, for the first time, I partecipated to0ctf withmhackeroni. Me,@Ricy and@Alemmi solved this challenge, we spent many hours in order to find a working exploit, but it was worth it.]]>
